description:

But after all the gigs done in 2009 they kicked Tomsin out personal disagreements. A few days later their maniacal friend and huge Evil Invaders fan, Stringking Pussymagnet Alain joined the band.
 HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a great musician and they were really happy that he was a part of Evil Invaders. In october 2010 Agent StavrÃƒÂ¶z is being replaced by Sam Lemmens (guitarist FallouT).
 In 2011 Speedfreak Frey left the band and Senne Jacobs become the new drummer. Furthermore in 2013 Stringking Pussymagnet Alain also left the bande and replaced by Nico Beekwilder who played in a french band called Voltrage before.
 But after one year Nico Beekwilder was also left the band and replaced by Max Mayhem.
 Since the band formed it released one demo in 2009 called D-emokill,a self-titled EP in 2013 and now in 2015 they finally released their first full-length album called Pulses of Pleasure.
